content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STAT
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: NOT DONE
    - name: --ORRES
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.85
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: There should always be data presented in the --ORRES variable unless  --STAT
  = "NOT DONE".
Outcome:
  Message: --ORRES must be populated as --STAT is not equal to 'NOT DONE'
  Output Variables:
    - --STAT
    - --ORRES
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '85'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: --ORRES is an Expected variable and should always
                  be populated except when --STAT = 'NOT DONE'
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: There should always be data presented in the --ORRES variable unless  --STAT = "NOT DONE".

Outcome.Message: --ORRES must be populated as --STAT is not equal to 'NOT DONE'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: --ORRES is an Expected variable and should always be populated except when --STAT = 'NOT DONE'
